build-your-own-form.title: Build your own form
build-your-own-form.subheader: Access the build your own form guidance link

address.header: What is your address in the UK?
address.intro: If you have no fixed address, enter an address where we can contact you.

confirm.header: Check your answers before submitting your application.

confirmation.title: Application sent
confirmation.content: We’ll contact you with the decision of your application or if we need more information from you.

exit.message: We have cleared your information to keep it secure. Your information has not been saved.

session-timeout-warning.dialog-text: If that happens, your progress will not be saved.

session-timeout-warning-save-exit.dialog-title: You will be signed out soon
session-timeout-warning-save-exit.dialog-text: If that happens, any answers you saved have not been affected but your progress on this page will not be saved.

save-and-exit.paragraph-1: Your form doesn’t appear to have been worked on for 30 minutes so we closed it for security.
save-and-exit.paragraph-2: Any answers you saved have not been affected.
save-and-exit.paragraph-3: You can sign back in to your application at any time by returning to the
